content.text: AI Image Generation Tools

content.alt: AI image generation tools collage showing outputs from various platforms
content.caption: The landscape of AI image generation: from photorealistic to artistic, every tool has its strengths

content.text: AI image generation has transformed visual content creation. Whether you need cinematic stills, concept art, product mockups, or social media graphics, there is an AI tool designed for your use case. This chapter covers 9 leading AI image generation tools, their unique strengths, ideal prompt structures, and practical tips for getting the best results.

AI-generated images are only as good as the prompts you write. Each tool interprets prompts differently, so understanding each platform's strengths and syntax is essential for consistent, high-quality output.
1. Midjourney

content.alt: Midjourney interface showing Discord bot and web app side by side
content.caption: Midjourney operates through Discord and its dedicated web application

content.text: Midjourney is widely regarded as the gold standard for AI-generated art. It excels at producing stylized, cinematic, and emotionally rich visuals with exceptional aesthetic quality. Midjourney's latest models (V6 and V7) have dramatically improved photorealism, text rendering, and prompt coherence.
Midjourney: Discord vs Web Access
Midjourney can be accessed in two ways, each with distinct advantages:
The web app at midjourney.com provides a more streamlined experience with visual settings controls. Discord remains popular for community engagement and seeing what others are creating in real-time.
Midjourney: Settings & Configuration
Midjourney offers several configurable settings that dramatically affect output quality and style. Understanding these settings gives you fine-grained control over your generations.

rows: Aspect ratio and dimensions of generated images
How much artistic stylization is applied; higher = more artistic
The AI model used; newer versions have better coherence
Generation speed — Turbo is fastest but costs more GPU time
How unconventional or experimental the output should be
How different the 4 generated images are from each other
Less automatic beautification, more literal prompt interpretation

content.alt: Midjourney settings panel showing sliders for aesthetics, weirdness, and variety
content.caption: The Midjourney settings panel allows precise control over generation parameters

content.text: Midjourney: Upload Functionality

Midjourney supports image uploads as references. You can upload a photo and use it as a style reference, character reference, or composition guide. This is invaluable for maintaining consistency across a series of images.

rows: Upload URL at start of prompt
Uses the uploaded image as a visual influence on the generation
Copies the artistic style (colors, mood, technique) of the reference
Maintains character appearance consistency across generations
Controls how strongly the uploaded image influences the result

content.title: Midjourney Image Reference Prompt
content.code: https://example.com/my-character.png A warrior standing on a cliff at sunset, epic fantasy landscape, dramatic lighting --cref https://example.com/my-character.png --sref https://example.com/style-reference.png --ar 16:9 --v 7

content.text: Midjourney: Creation Actions (Vary & Upscale)
After generating your initial 4 images, Midjourney provides powerful post-generation actions to refine your selections.

rows: Creates small variations of the selected image, maintaining core composition
Creates significant variations, keeping the general concept but changing details
Regenerates only a selected region of the image (inpainting)
Increases resolution with minimal changes to the image
Increases resolution while adding new fine details
Expands the canvas around the image, generating new surrounding content
Extends the image in a specific direction

content.alt: Midjourney vary and upscale buttons interface
content.caption: Post-generation actions: Vary, Upscale, Zoom, and Pan controls

content.text: Midjourney: Prompt Codes (Parameters)
Midjourney parameters are appended to the end of your prompt using the -- prefix. These give you precise control over technical aspects of the generation.

rows: Quality level — higher = more detail, slower
Stylize amount — how artistic vs literal
Chaos — how varied the 4 results are
Stop generation partway for abstract effects

content.title: Midjourney Full Prompt with Parameters
content.code: A lone samurai standing in a field of red spider lilies, fog rolling in from ancient mountains, golden hour lighting, cinematic composition, hyper-detailed armor with intricate engravings, volumetric light rays, Studio Ghibli meets dark fantasy --ar 16:9 --v 7 --s 750 --q 1 --no text, watermark

content.title: Midjourney Tileable Pattern Prompt
content.code: Japanese wave pattern, navy blue and gold, traditional ukiyo-e style, seamless repeating design, woodblock print texture --tile --v 7 --s 500 --ar 1:1

content.text: Combine --sref (style reference) with --cref (character reference) to maintain both visual style consistency and character appearance across a series of images — essential for storyboarding and video pre-production.
2. Runway Image (Gen-2 / Gen-3)

content.caption: Runway's AI tools bridge the gap between still images and video production

content.text: Runway is primarily known for AI video generation, but its image capabilities are powerful for film production workflows. It excels at generating consistent characters, scenes, and storyboard frames that can then be animated into video.
Key Features: Text-to-image, image-to-image, style transfer, frame interpolation, multi-frame consistency for storyboarding.

content.title: Runway Image Prompt
content.code: A detective in a rain-soaked noir city, standing under a flickering neon sign, trench coat and fedora, film grain texture, 1940s atmosphere, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, cinematic still frame

content.text: Runway's greatest strength is that images generated on the platform can be directly animated into video using Gen-2 or Gen-3 Alpha, making it ideal for end-to-end AI video production.
3. DALL-E

content.alt: DALL-E image generation and editing interface in ChatGPT
content.caption: DALL-E integrates directly into ChatGPT for conversational image generation

content.text: DALL-E (by OpenAI) focuses on photorealistic, design-ready images with strong inpainting and editing capabilities. Integrated directly into ChatGPT, it allows conversational image generation — describe what you want, see the result, then refine with natural language.
Ideal Prompt Structure: Be descriptive and specific. DALL-E responds well to detailed scene descriptions, lighting specifications, and style references.

content.title: DALL-E Photorealistic Prompt
content.code: A cozy independent bookshop on a rainy autumn evening, warm golden light spilling through the windows onto wet cobblestone streets, a hand-painted wooden sign, vintage bicycles parked outside, photorealistic, shot on 35mm film, shallow depth of field, tilt-shift effect

content.title: DALL-E Editing/Inpainting Prompt
content.code:
Take the generated bookshop image and:
1. Add a cat sitting in the window display
2. Change the sign text to read "The Wandering Page"
3. Add string lights hanging between the buildings
4. Make the sky a deeper twilight purple

rows: Edit specific regions of an image with text prompts
Extend images beyond their original borders
Much better text rendering than previous versions
No parameter codes — all control is through descriptive text
Strong content filters, no public figure generation

content.text: 4. Gemini (Imagen)

content.alt: Gemini image generation interface showing text and image output
content.caption: Gemini combines Google's search knowledge with Imagen's generation capabilities

content.text: Gemini (powered by Google's Imagen model) generates images with strong contextual awareness and factual grounding. It excels at educational visuals, diagrams, and images that need to accurately represent real-world concepts.
Ideal Prompt Structure: Gemini works well with descriptive, context-rich prompts. It understands references to real locations, historical periods, and scientific concepts better than most tools.

content.title: Gemini Image Prompt
content.code: Generate an educational infographic-style image showing the water cycle. Include labeled arrows showing evaporation, condensation, precipitation, and collection. Use a clean, modern illustration style with a blue and white color palette. The image should be suitable for a high school science presentation.

content.text: Gemini integrates with Google Search, so it can generate images that reflect current events, real locations, and up-to-date cultural references. It is particularly strong for educational and informational content.
5. Stable Diffusion

content.alt: Stable Diffusion running locally with ComfyUI interface
content.caption: Stable Diffusion's open-source nature enables local deployment with custom interfaces like ComfyUI

content.text: Stable Diffusion is the most flexible and customizable AI image generation tool available. As an open-source model, it can be run locally on your own hardware, fine-tuned on custom datasets, and extended with community-built models (LoRAs, embeddings, ControlNets).

Key Features: Fully open-source, local deployment (no cloud dependency), thousands of community fine-tuned models, ControlNet for pose/composition control, LoRA models for specific styles or characters.

rows: Power users who want maximum control

content.title: Stable Diffusion Prompt (SDXL)
content.code:
masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, 8k uhd, a cyberpunk street market at night, holographic signs in Japanese, vendors selling bioluminescent food, rain-slicked streets reflecting neon colors, dense crowd of diverse characters with cybernetic augmentations, atmospheric fog, volumetric lighting

Negative prompt: low quality, blurry, distorted, deformed, watermark, text, signature, out of frame

content.text: Stable Diffusion requires a GPU with at least 6GB VRAM for local generation. SDXL models need 8GB+ VRAM. If you do not have suitable hardware, use cloud-based interfaces like Dream Studio or RunPod.
6. Dream Studio

Dream Studio is the official web interface from Stability AI for Stable Diffusion. It provides a user-friendly, credit-based system that makes Stable Diffusion accessible without any technical setup or local hardware.
Ideal Prompt Structure: Similar to Stable Diffusion — use descriptive language with quality modifiers. Dream Studio supports negative prompts and various generation settings through its GUI.

rows: Which Stable Diffusion model to use
How strictly the AI follows your prompt

content.title: Dream Studio Prompt
content.code:
A serene Japanese zen garden in morning mist, raked sand patterns, moss-covered stones, a single cherry blossom tree in full bloom, soft diffused sunlight, photographic style, shot on Hasselblad medium format, f/2.8, golden hour

Style Preset: Photographic
CFG Scale: 7
Steps: 40

content.text: 7. Adobe Firefly

content.alt: Adobe Firefly integrated into Photoshop workspace
content.caption: Adobe Firefly brings AI generation directly into the Creative Cloud workflow

content.text: Adobe Firefly is designed for commercial safety and professional design workflows. Trained exclusively on licensed Adobe Stock images, openly licensed content, and public domain material, Firefly-generated images are safe for commercial use without copyright concerns.
Key Features: Content Credentials (provenance tracking), Generative Fill in Photoshop, Text Effects, commercial-use licensing, seamless Creative Cloud integration.

rows: Adobe Stock, licensed content, public domain only
Embedded metadata showing AI generation provenance
Generative Fill, Generative Expand directly in PSD files
Designers, agencies, brands needing IP-safe content

content.title: Adobe Firefly Prompt
content.code: Professional product photography of a luxury watch on a dark marble surface, dramatic studio lighting with a single key light from the upper left, subtle reflections, shallow depth of field, magazine advertisement quality, clean and minimal composition

content.text: Adobe Firefly is the safest choice for commercial projects where copyright and IP concerns are paramount. Content Credentials provide transparent provenance tracking, which is increasingly important for brand trust.
8. Meta AI

content.alt: Meta AI image generation within social media platform
content.caption: Meta AI makes image generation accessible directly within social media platforms

content.text: Meta AI provides free, accessible image generation integrated into Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Messenger. It is designed for casual content creation and social media graphics.

Ideal Prompt Structure: Simple, conversational descriptions work best. Meta AI is optimized for social media contexts, so prompts do not need to be as technically detailed as those for Midjourney or Stable Diffusion.

content.title: Meta AI Image Prompt
content.code: A golden retriever puppy wearing a tiny graduation cap and gown, sitting on a stack of books, confetti falling, celebration background, bright and cheerful, perfect for a social media congratulations post

rows: Social media content, casual images, quick visual ideas
Less control than specialized tools, safety filters, lower resolution
Integrated into social platforms — generate and share without leaving the app

content.text: 9. Grok (xAI)

content.alt: Grok AI image generation interface on X platform
content.caption: Grok's image generation integrates with X (Twitter) for real-time context-aware generation

content.text: Grok, developed by xAI (Elon Musk's AI company), provides image generation with fewer content restrictions than most competitors. It is integrated into the X (Twitter) platform and can generate images with real-time context from trending topics and conversations.
Key Features: Fewer content filters, real-time X platform data integration, ability to generate images of public figures (with some limitations), humorous and irreverent style options.

content.title: Grok Image Prompt
content.code: A dramatic editorial magazine cover featuring a robot CEO giving a TED talk to an audience of surprised humans, photojournalistic style, TIME magazine aesthetic, bold headline typography, dramatic stage lighting

content.text: While Grok has fewer restrictions than some competitors, it still has safety guidelines. Its real-time integration with X makes it particularly useful for generating topical, meme-worthy, or culturally relevant imagery.
Choosing the Right Tool
Selecting the right AI image tool depends on your specific needs. Use the decision guide below to match your project requirements to the best tool.

rows: Open source, LoRAs, ControlNet, local deployment
Images that convert directly to video

content.alt: Decision flowchart for choosing an AI image generation tool
content.caption: A decision flowchart to help you select the right AI image tool for your project

content.text: Universal Prompting Tips
Regardless of which tool you use, these prompting principles will improve your results across all platforms:

rows: Instead of 'a dog' say 'a border collie with heterochromia'
'shot on 85mm f/1.4, shallow depth of field'
'in the style of Studio Ghibli watercolor backgrounds'
'rule of thirds, subject on left, negative space right'
Use negative prompts or --no to remove unwanted elements
Treat first generations as starting points, not final outputs

content.question: Which AI image tool is best suited for commercial projects where copyright safety is the top priority?
What does the Midjourney parameter --sref do?
options: Sets the generation seed for reproducibility
Applies a style reference from an uploaded image
Controls the strength of the stylization

content.question: Which tool allows you to run AI image generation locally on your own hardware?
What is the primary advantage of Runway's image generation compared to other tools?
options: It is the cheapest option available
Generated images can be directly animated into video
It has no content restrictions at all
